alert.note: Alert for Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 2:21PM CDT until April 12 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Winona County in southeastern Minnesota... Southern Olmsted County in southeastern Minnesota... Southeastern Wabasha County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 221 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stewartville, or 7 miles southeast of Rochester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eyota around 230 PM CDT. Dover around 235 PM CDT. St. Charles around 240 PM CDT. Altura around 250 PM CDT. Buffalo City and Rollingstone around 255 PM CDT. Winona, Goodview and Fountain City around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Whitewater State Park, Lock And Dam 5 A, County Roads 9 And 10, Whitman, County Roads 28 And 31, Utica and Rochester Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 209 and 234. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
